Interface SalesProcess

    public interface SalesProcess

      Creates a sales document.
      void listAll()
      Lists all data existing on the Sales database.

      List all data/sales document of a specific customer.

    • Method Detail

      • createSalesDocument

        int createSalesDocument(java.sql.Timestamp effectiveDate,
                      int customerID)
        Creates a sales document.
        Parameters:
        effectiveDate - the date where the purchase/sales is effective
        customerID - the ID of the customer
        Returns:
        a specific sales_id

      • orderProduct

        void orderProduct(int salesID,
                java.lang.String productID,
                int quantity)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Orders a specific product existing on the products list.
        Parameters:
        salesID - the sales_id existing in the sales document
        productID - the product_id of the existing product
        quantity - the number of orders in the specific product
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception when errors on querying happened

      • listAll

        void listAll()
        Lists all data existing on the Sales database.

      • listOrdersofCustomer

        void listOrdersofCustomer(int customerID)
        List all data/sales document of a specific customer.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the customer's ID

      • saveDatabase

        void saveDatabase()
        Records all data committed and closes the database connection.
